airtrafficcontrol.app.utils

Class FlightPlan

  • java.lang.Object
    • airtrafficcontrol.app.utils.FlightPlan

  • public class FlightPlan
extends java.lang.Object
    allows to build the plan of the flight
    Author:
    Eva Gomes, Hugo Leal, Lucas Andrade

    • Constructor Detail

      • FlightPlan

        public FlightPlan(java.util.Calendar departureHour,
                  java.util.Calendar arrivalHour)
           throws InvalidArgumentException
        Creates a new instance of FlightPlan. Stores the hour when the take-off and the landing will happen and initializes a new empty list where the plan of the flight will be saved (the air corridor changes).
        Parameters:
        departureHour - When the plane takes off.
        arrivalHour - When the plane lands.
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException

      • getCurrentCorridor

        public AltitudeCorridor getCurrentCorridor()
        Returns:
        the corridor where the airplane is supposed to be in, at the time when the method was called
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException

      • getCorridorAtTime

        public AltitudeCorridor getCorridorAtTime(java.util.Calendar time)
                                   throws InvalidArgumentException
        returns the corridor where the airplane is supposed to be at the date passed as parameter
        Parameters:
        time - - date when we want to know the corridor
        Returns:
        corridor where the airplane is supposed to be, at the date passed as parameter
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException

      • setNewArrivalHour

        public void setNewArrivalHour(java.util.Calendar newArrivalHour,
                              int numberOfMinutesToLand)
                       throws InvalidArgumentException
        sets a new hour for the plane's landing
        Parameters:
        newArrivalHour - - the hour when the plane is now supposed to land
        numberOfMinutesToLand - - the number of minutes the plane needs to descend from the last corridor it was in, until it lands
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException
